snippet: “Steve Austin’s Broken Skull Challenge” and “American Muscle” may lure the fittest of athletes, but only one may keep them that way.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews CMT television series Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge and Discovery Channel series American Muscle.
lead_paragraph: “Steve Austin’s Broken Skull Challenge” and “American Muscle” may lure the fittest of athletes, but only one may keep them that way.

headline.main: In Battle of Muscle Shows, Only One Is Having Fun
